name: CQ.Ext.Updater
doc:
Provides AJAX-style update capabilities for Element objects.  Updater can be used to update
an CQ...

props.name: disableCaching
props.doc: Whether to append unique parameter on get request to disable caching (defaults to CQ.Ext.Updater...

props.name: indicatorText
props.doc: Text for loading indicator (defaults to CQ.Ext.Updater.defaults.indicatorText).

props.name: loadScripts
props.doc: True to process scripts in the output (defaults to CQ.Ext.Updater.defaults.loadScripts).

props.name: showLoadIndicator
props.doc: Whether to show indicatorText when loading (defaults to CQ.Ext.Updater.defaults.showLoadIndicator).

props.name: sslBlankUrl
props.doc: Blank page URL to use with SSL file uploads (defaults to CQ.Ext.Updater.defaults.sslBlankUrl).

props.name: timeout
props.doc: Timeout for requests or form posts in seconds (defaults to CQ.Ext.Updater.defaults.timeout).

methods.name: Updater.updateElement
methods.doc: <static> Static convenience method. This method is deprecated in favor of el.load({url:'foo...

methods.name: abort
methods.doc: Aborts the currently executing transaction, if any.

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: formUpdate
methods.doc: Performs an asynchronous form post, updating this element with the response. If the form has the ...

methods.name: getDefaultRenderer
methods.doc:
This is an overrideable method which returns a reference to a default
renderer class if none is s...

methods.name: getEl
methods.doc: Get the Element this Updater is bound to

methods.name: getRenderer
methods.doc: Returns the current content renderer for this Updater. See CQ.Ext.Updater.BasicRenderer.render fo...

methods.name: isAutoRefreshing
methods.doc: Returns true if the Updater is currently set to auto refresh its content (see startAutoRefresh), ...

methods.name: isUpdating
methods.doc: Returns true if an update is in progress, otherwise false.

methods.name: refresh
methods.doc: Refresh the element with the last used url or defaultUrl. If there is no url, it returns immediately

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

methods.name: setDefaultUrl
methods.doc: Sets the default URL used for updates.

methods.name: setRenderer
methods.doc: Sets the content renderer for this Updater. See CQ.Ext.Updater.BasicRenderer.render for more deta...

methods.name: showLoading
methods.doc: Display the element's "loading" state. By default, the element is updated with indicatorText. Thi...

methods.name: startAutoRefresh
methods.doc: Set this element to auto refresh.  Can be canceled by calling stopAutoRefresh.

methods.name: stopAutoRefresh
methods.doc: Stop auto refresh on this element.

methods.name: update
methods.doc:
Performs an asynchronous request, updating this element with the response.

events.name: beforeupdate
events.doc: Fired before an update is made, return false from your handler and the update is cancelled.

events.name: update
events.doc: Fired after successful update is made.
